citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a written contingency plan in place. Facilities are required to have a written contingency plan
which addresses the care and handling of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The plan must be kept
current, and contain the required information for the facility per this section. The facility must correct this issue.
*******Correct by January 15, 2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility did not have a written contingency plan in place. Facilities are required to have a written contingency plan 
which addresses the care and handling of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The plan must be kept 
current, and contain the required information for the facility per this section. The facility must correct this issue. 
*******Correct by January 15, 2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
